attributes.action: use the big brother petition to extrapolate the amount of sigatures needed for other petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: questions were asked in the house of commons and a diplomatic incident over the big brother race row. Now use this petition to extrapolate figures for other petitions such as the road pricing one. for example 15000 people complained to ofwatch over big brother and only 8 people (so far) have signed the petition. using those figures, half a million on the road pricing petition would indicate the whole population of britain against the idea.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
